Custom Chat Colors

Custom UI Colors

Minor bug fixes

0.3.0

Spacebar Mute: For those of you who made the transition from Turntable.FM, you are probably familiar with this feature.

Chat Image Zoom: You can now click on the inline chat images to zoom-in without having to open the image in a new tab.

Several bug fixes

0.2.17

Another fix for Plug.DJ update...

0.2.16

Fix for Plug.DJ update. Sorry for the delay.

0.2.15

AutoJoin: With great power comes great responsibility. You no longer have to worry about clicking the waitlist button when you join the room or after a song.

0.2.14

'Unable to Play' popups are now toggled in the menu. The default is to show them now as Plug.DJ seems to have fixed some of the previous bugs that caused them.

Minor bug fixes

0.2.13

Video Opacity

Minor Bug fix

0.2.12

AFK Autorespond: You can set a message that will automatically display when you are away and mentioned

0.2.9

Plug.DJ update fix

0.2.10

Fix for autowoot bug

0.2.8

Sorry for the recent breaks. Plug.DJ has been updating more regularly.

0.2.7

Minor Bug Fix

0.2.6

Fix for Plug.DJ Update

0.2.5

Fix for mute bug

0.2.4

Menu has been split up into sections to allow for more items to be added in future.

Custom Mention Sound: You can now set your own mention sound, just type in the url and youre good to go

0.2.2

Fix for Plug.DJ update

Re-played Song Alert: An alert will show up in the chat box if the current song is in the DJ History.

Automute songs: Tired of hearing a particular song. You can now automatically mute the song whenever it is played (accessible through commands)

0.2.1

Favorite button is always visible now. Icons changed as well.

0.2.0

Fix for Plug.DJ update

0.1.9

Bug fix for an item that I thought was fixed earlier

Added settings to toggle what items reset a user's AFK timer. A chat message will always reset the timer, but you can now choose to enable/disable resets on Votes (Woots & Mehs) and Grabs

0.1.8

Homepage favorite room list is now back.

Small bug fix for emoji suggestions.

Code optimization

0.1.7

Minor bug fixes for:

  • Chat Images
  • Settings storage

0.1.6

Chat Emoji Suggestions: Just like with usernames on mentions, a list will display suggestions when you begin typing in an emoji string

0.1.4

MAJOR UPDATE!

The extension has been completely re-written to utilize Plug.DJ's existing functions for a seamless integration.

Lobby favorites list is not available in this release, but will be added in an upcoming update.

0.1.3

Bug fix for chat mentions

0.1.2

User votes now reset the afk timer after multiple requests

Minor bug fixes

0.1.1

Some style changes

Grabs now reset the users afk time.

0.1.0

AFK Timers: The AFK time of users in the waitlist is now visible. You can also check the afk time of the current DJ by hovering over their avatar.

Additional features added to favorites! You can now view your favorites list from any room. Just click on the main plug menu and select favorites.

0.0.9

Improved image link compatibility!

0.0.8

Chat Images: GIFS! Images can be viewed directly in the chat window.

Few minor bug fixes

0.0.7

Favorite Rooms: You can now keep a list of your favorite rooms. Your lists of favorites can be viewed from the Plug.DJ homepage

Fixed a bug with the custom mentions

0.0.5

Popup Blocker: The 'Unable to Play' window will no longer show up

Custom Mentions: Set your own keywords for notifications

New Commands

0.0.3

Mentions: New, Louder notification MP3 added

0.0.2

AutoWoot: Don't worry about clicking that 'woot' button every song, this extension does it for you.

Mentions: You may have noticed that the mention sounds on Plug.DJ do not work. PlugX fixes this problem.

Background: Not feeling the default plug background? You can now display a custom background

Custom UI: Layout and color fixes for Plug.DJ to improve usability

New Song Info: At the start of each song, the info will be displayed in the chat box.

Custom Commands: Built in commands allow you to preform a multitude of tasks directly from the chat box.

Video Playback: Hide the video from view
